title: settings
description: JSON schema for the configuration of the CRF Heat Map
overview:
The most straightforward way to customize the CRF Heat Map is by using a configuration object whose properties describe the behavior and appearance of the table.  Since the CRF Heat Map is a Webcharts `table` object, many default Webcharts settings are set in the [webchartsSettings.js file](https://github.com/RhoInc/crf-heat-map/blob/master/src/configuration/webchartsSettings.js) as [described below](#webcharts-settings).  Refer to the [Webcharts documentation](https://github.com/RhoInc/Webcharts/wiki/Chart-Configuration) for more details on these settings.
In addition to the standard Webcharts settings several custom settings not available in the base Webcharts library have been added to the CRF Heat Map to facilitate data mapping and other custom functionality.  These custom settings are described in detail below and are set in the [rendererSettings.js file](https://github.com/RhoInc/crf-heat-map/blob/master/src/configuration/rendererSettings.js).  All defaults can be overwritten by the passed configuration object.

site_col.title: Site Column
site_col.description: Specifies variable for use as site ID

id_col.title: Subject ID Column
id_col.description: Specifies variable for use as subject ID

visit_col.title: Visit Column
visit_col.description: Specifies variable for use as Visit ID

visit_order_col.title: Visit Order Column
visit_order_col.description: Specifies variable for determining order of Visit ID

form_col.title: Form Column
form_col.description: Specifies variable for use as Form ID

id_freeze_col.title: Subject Freeze Column
id_freeze_col.description: Specifies variable for subject-level freeze status

nestings.title: Data Nesting
nestings.description: an array of objects specifying the variables to nest the data by for calculations

value_cols.title: CRF and Query Columns
value_cols.description: binary CRF flags and query frequencies that capture some status related to the case report form (CRF)

default.label: Entered
default.description: Data have been submitted in the EDC system.

default.label: Source Data Verified
default.description: All required fields have source data verification complete in EDC.

default.label: Ready for Freeze
default.description: All required cleaning is complete (e.g. SDV, queries resolved) and data are ready to be frozen in EDC.

default.label: Frozen
default.description: Data have been frozen in the EDC system.

default.label: Signed
default.description: Data have been signed in the EDC system.

default.label: Locked
default.description: Data have been locked in the EDC system.

default.label: Open
default.description: Site has not responded to issue.

default.label: Answered
default.description: Site has responded to issue, DM needs to review.

filter_cols.title: Data Filters
filter_cols.description: variables in the data with which to filter the data

items.title: Variable Name
items.description: the name of the filter variable

display_cell_annotations.title: Display Cell Annotations
display_cell_annotations.description: displays cell annotations always or only on hover

expand_all.title: Expand All Rows
expand_all.description: expands all nests so that no rows are hidden

sliders.title: Enable Slider Filters
sliders.description: Replaces input boxes with sliders for filtering rows
